text: Kitti Jones had been dreaming of this moment for years. It was June 2011, and R. Kelly had just performed to a frenetic crowd at the Verizon Theatre outside Dallas, Texas. It had been nearly two decades since the singer ’ s raunchy lyrics and honeyed voice turned him into a R & B superstar and sex symbol. But despite multiple controversies over his alleged sexual relationships with underage girls, his still - dedicated fan base sent his latest album – the throwback soul LP Love Letter – to Number Six on the Billboard 200.
